increased = 289 sts row 16 slip wyif k4 p3 k1 k1 p5 k2 work once ka ana chart p3 k1 23 times k4 using stitch markers in section two row 17 slip wyif k2 p2 k1 yo k1 yo you may find it helpful to mark the beginning of k1 p2 ssk k1 k2tog p2 23 times k1 yo each repeat with a stitch marker if so on row k1 yo k1 p2 k3 2 sts increased = 291 sts 15 17 and 19 you will need to shift each stitch row 18 slip wyif k4 p5 k2 p3 k2 p5 marker one stitch to the left away from the 23 times k5 beginning of the row on row 25 27 and 29 row 19 slip wyif k2 p2 k1 k1 yo k1 you will need to shift each stitch marker one yo k2 p2 cdd p2 k1 23 times k1 yo k1 stitch to the right toward the beginning of the yo k2 p2 k3 2 sts increased = 293 sts row row 20 slip wyif k4 p6 p1 k2 p1 k2 p6 23 times p1 k5 note if you have altered the size increase or row 21 slip wyif k2 p2 k1 k6 p5 k1 decrease the number of repeats accordingly in 23 times k6 p2 k3 increments of three repeats row 22 slip wyif k4 p6 p1 k5 p6 23 times p1 k5 3 after the chart is complete knit 3 row slipping row 23 slip wyif k2 yo p2 k1 k6 p2 the first stitch of each row wyif note if you yo k1 yo p2 k1 23 times k6 p2 yo k3 prefer a lacier edge you may skip these 3 row 48 sts increased = 341 sts and proceed to the bind-off step row 24 slip wyif k2 p1 k2 p6 p1 k2 p3 k2 p6 23 times p1 k2 p1 k3 on ws using larger needles bind off as follows row 25 slip wyif k3 yo p2 ssk k3 slip wyif k1 return 2 sts to the left needle k2tog p2 yo k3 yo p2 23 times ssk k3 k2tog tbl to end of row pull yarn through final k2tog p2 yo k4 loop note to bind off more quickly you can row 26 slip wyif k2 p2 k2 p5 k2 p5 skip the step of returning the 2 stitches to the k2 p5 23 times k2 p2 k3 left needle instead insert the left needle into row 27 slip wyif k2 yo ssk yo p1 p1 the front loops of the 2 stitches on the right ssk k1 k2tog p2 yo k2tog yo k1 yo ssk needle and knit them together from
